snippet: Morgan Stanley and Citigroup agreed to value their brokerage joint venture, Morgan Stanley Smith Barney, at $13.5 billion, allowing Morgan Stanley to buy full control of the business at a favorable valuation.
abstract: Morgan Stanley and Citigroup agreed to value their brokerage joint venture, Morgan Stanley Smith Barney, at $13.5 billion, allowing Morgan Stanley to buy full control of the business at a favorable valuation.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Morgan Stanley to Take Over Smith Barney, With Citigroup's Blessing
headline.print_headline: Morgan Stanley to Take Over Smith Barney, With Citigroup’s Blessing
